                      什么值得买是一家中立的消费门户网站，好价信息来自热心值友爆料和商家自荐，经小编人工审核或小值机器人智能判断后发布。促销折扣可能随时变化，请值友们购买前注意核实。

        <li class="li other goods" id="haojia_error" data-name="好价失效">
            好价失效
            <div class="other_report_box goods_report_box">
                请选择举报理由：
                <ul class="report_reason report_reason1">
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error_one" data-type="1" name="haojia_error" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error_one"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error_one" class="">无货或下架</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error_two" data-type="2" name="haojia_error" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error_two"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error_two" class="">已涨价</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error_three" data-type="17" name="haojia_error" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error_three"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error_three" class="">优惠券或促销活动失效</label>
                    </li>
                </ul>
                <button>确认提交</button>
            </div>
        </li>

        <li class="li other goods" id="haojia_error1" data-name="内容问题">
            内容问题
            <div class="other_report_box goods_report_box">
                请选择举报理由：

                        <!-- highlight -->
                        <div class="list-item-level1 ">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->
                                    <h3>
                                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/3902428809/pinglun" target="_blank">yuzhixing</a>

                        <!-- 分页样式 -->
            <ul class="pagination"><li><a href="#comments" class="pageCurrent pagination-item">1</a></li><li><a href="p2/#comments" class="pagination-item">2</a></li><li class="pagedown"><a href="p2/#comments" class="pagination-item"><i class="icon-angle-right-o-thin"></i></a></li><li class="jumpToPage">转至<input type="text" class="input_num" id="input_num">页</li><li><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="a_jumpTo" onclick="return on_check_comment_page(2, '', this)">GO</a></li></ul>        </div>
